title: 11-year-old shot on Mellowood Drive in Richland County
content:
Deputies responded to a shots fired call Wednesday and found an 11-year-old boy shot in the lower body.
The incident happened at 6:15 p.m. in the 4300 block of Mellowood Drive, not far from Bluff Road, according to the Richland County Sheriff’s Department.
Investigators have the weapon and have identified everyone involved in the incident, sheriff’s spokesman Lt. Curtis Wilson said.
Glen Luke Flanagan: 803-771-8305, @glenlflanagan
